content: wribbed wristers these wribbed wristers are practical cuffs which cover both the hand and the wrist they can be worn by themselves over gloves or under mittens and were used by soldiers in wwi after removing a mitten in cold weather your hand stays protected while using keys or tools indoors hands stay warm while knitting reading or working at the computer keyboard this pattern can be
